Features

  • Heavy hand made iron fittings

  • Features a Bronze Organza shade to soften lighting

  • Main body painted in a Heritage Bronze finish

Description

The Remy collection is a striking family with clear influence from the French Arts and Crafts scene, in particular featuring a decorative metal circle finished in Parisienne Gold. These heavy hand made iron fittings include a Bronze Organza shade to soften the lighting with the main fitting body painted in a Heritage Bronze finish.

Features

  • Wall Light 
  • Build Materials: Iron
  • Maximum Wattage: 60W
  • Socket: E14
  • Voltage: 220-240V, 50Hz
  • Class: Class I 
  • Number of lamps: 1
  • Integrated LED: No
  • Bulb Included: No
  • Dimmable: Yes (with suitable bulbs)
  • Guarantee: 2 Years 

Dimensions

  • Box Dimensions: L42 x D29 x H20 cm
  • Fitting Height: 34.3cm
  • Width: 20.5cm
  • Projection:10.2cm
  • Net Weight: 2.79kg
  • Final Weight: 3.1kg

Features

  • Heavy
  • Duty Steel Frame

  • Patented EZ
  • Fold Design To Save Space

  •  Transparent Shatterproof Polycarbonate Backboard

  •  LED Electronic Scorer With Game Sounds

  • Dimensions: H 213
  • 4 x W 121
  • 9 x D 205
  • 7 cm

     

    Includes: 4 x Basketballs, 1 x Inflation Pump with Needle

Description

Great indoor family entertainment game that’s built to last and provide countless hours of fun. Heavy-duty steel tube constructed frame, metal rims, clear polycarbonate backboard, hi-tech digital scoreboard with game sounds elevate this type of game above all others. When finished playing, the patented EZ Fold system allows you to easily fold this game in half for easy storage, saving you valuable floor space, which is great for small living spaces. Stay entertained for hours with 8 different game modes to choose from. Includes 4 rubber basketballs.

 

Features:

  • Heavy-duty powder coated steel frame
  • Patented EZ-Fold design for easy storage
  • Transparent shatterproof polycarbonate backboard
  • Oversized LED electronic scoreboard with built in speaker for game sound effects
  • Protective side netting on both sides to keep balls in play
  • 12" steel rims with heavy-duty nylon-polyester nets
  • Dimensions: H 213.4 x W 121.9 x D 205.7 cm
  • Weight: 52.5 kg

Specifications

BrandMedal Sports
MaterialSteel
TypeBasketball
DimensionsH 213.4 x W 121.9 x D 205.7 cm

Features

    • Portable and lightweight work table with integrated handle for easy transportation
    • Folding design to save storage space
    • Large work surface that holds up to 453kg
    • No assembly required and only 30 seconds to set up and use

Description

Assembly Instructions

The Keter Folding Worktable is a highly versatile work station with many beneficial features . It has a lightweight frame allowing you to fold and carry it with ease, yet it's sturdy enough to support a 453kg load when assembled. 

The Worktable is quick and easy to set up, taking just 30 seconds. Simply pull the release latches and lift the table top. The legs will automatically drop into place, and you just need to lock the side supports and fasten the table.

A unique fold system that makes it quick and simple to set up and pack away.

Features

  • Portable work station
  • Takes just 30 seconds to set up with its unique quick-opening system
  • Two 30cm/12″ clamps go horizontal or vertical to suit almost any job
  • Lightweight with integrated handle for easy transportation
  • Easily folds flat in seconds to save valuable storage space between uses
  • Strong enough to hold 453 kg / 1000 lbs

Specifications

BrandKeter
MaterialMetal
TypeWork Station
DimensionsFolded: H 11.2 x W 55 x D 85 cm
Weight12.25kg

Features

  • Lightweight For Portability
  • Large Steps Designed For Comfort and Stability
  • Features Easy
  • Release Lock to Fold Step Stool
  • EN 14183 (150kg) Rated Load Capacity

Description

This Cosco Three Step Folding Step Stool is ideal for any task around the house. Whether it’s reaching that high cabinet, changing a light bulb or washing the windows, this product makes it easier to get any job done. This lightweight step stool features large steps that are designed for stability and comfort, an easy-release lock to fold the step stool and is lightweight, making it easy to move around.

Features:

  • Lightweight for portability, making this step stool easy to move around
  • Large steps designed for comfort and stability
  • Features easy-release lock to fold step stool
  • EN 14183 (150kg) rated load capacity
